meanings: flower[floral] language, the language of flowers

vlive.korean: 플로리스트? 꽃 그건가? Florist? Is it the flower thing? 듣기 View video AB6IX : 영민이의 '몰래라이브 #1'
vlive.english: Florist? Is it the flower thing?

vlive.korean: 그 꽃 내려놓고 저 큰 거 들어 큰 거! Put down that flower. Hold the big one! 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: Put down that flower. Hold the big one!

vlive.korean: 색깔 잘 어울린다! - 누가 꽃이야? The color looks good! - Who is the flower? 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: The color looks good! - Who is the flower?

vlive.korean: 꽃과 관련된 내용들 뭐... Something about flowers too. 듣기 View video WOODZ (조승연) : (진짜)조곤조곤
안 될... - 꽃 본연의... No. - It ruins the flower scent. 듣기 View video iKON : [Replay] iKON ‘i DECIDE’ COUNTDOWN LIVE
vlive.english: No. - It ruins the flower scent.

examples.korean: The butterfly fluttered from flower to flower. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나비는 이 꽃 저 꽃으로 훨훨 날아다녔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The butterfly fluttered from flower to flower. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The roses are in flower early this year. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 올해는 장미가 꽃이 일찍 피었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
